alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 11:37AM CDT until April 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning today, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For Thursday, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...The High Wind Warning for both today and Thursday is in effect from 7 AM through 8 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and possibly power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will likely lead to at least minor visibility restrictions, at times, through early evening. Be alert for rapidly changing conditions!
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
